content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Ah, Baihu Li from China! Thank you for visiting my apartment in Munich. I am certainly open to discussing the rental price with you. name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. This is the lowest price that I can accept. Please let me know if you have any questions.

My name is Baihu Li from China and I am a student. I am dependable and responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I have no intentions of breaking the lease agreement in the near future.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Well, I appreciate your offer of 800 Euros per month, Baihu Li. However, I am afraid that this price may not be sufficient to cover the costs associated with the apartment. I would need to see how the market compares and ensure that the rental price is competitive. Additionally, I am concerned about the long-term commitment of renting to a student. Therefore, I would like to explore other rental options and negotiate a more favorable price for myself. I hope you understand.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am willing to negotiate further. What is the current market rental price for an apartment in Munich of 25 square meters?

My name is Baihu Li from China and I am a student. I am dependable and responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I have no intentions of breaking the lease agreement in the near future.

name: Baihu Li from China

content:

I would like to emphasize that I am eager to maximize my gains on this property, while also ensuring that you are able to afford the rental price and maintain a good relationship with me as your landlord. name: Heinrich Heine
